info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 30 at 2:18AM CDT until April 3 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Green Bay WI
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin...
Oconto River above Oconto affecting Oconto County.
For the Oconto River...including Oconto...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Oconto River above Oconto.
* WHEN...From this morning to Thursday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Up to 2 feet of water is covering a campground in Oconto. Floodwaters begin to reach city streets adjacent to the river.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 8.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 7.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 10.8 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 530 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THURSDAY MORNING
